hero_images.name: Opening game
hero_images.text: In Red Bull Arena, French Guiana is in action against Canada as French Guiana attempts a corner kick during a 2017 CONCACAF Gold Cup match on July 7, 2017. This match was not only the opening game of the 2017 CONCACAF Gold Cup, but it was also the first every match at a major international tournament for French Guiana.
